reasoning:

If I hold the three Queens in hand and play 3 nines, the potential is even higher: more chips with all multipliers! If I play the nines, I keep the Shoot the Moon mult, giving me a much bigger score.

My strategy is the nines. I am calculating correctly: I have the time, the nines, and the multipliers to win this round!

I need to ditch the trash cards. I need those nines. I can take the chance on the discard. I have 2 discards left. I just need to get those Nines!

Okay, let's re-examine that Queen play. It is almost enough to win. But will it be enough? I need to recalculate.

Re-checking order: Base, Glass Mult (X2), Held Queens Mult (+13), Independent Jokers (+10 Holo, +20 Half), Multiplication Jokers (X3 Sharp, X1.5 Chicot). Doing it one more time to avoid a loss!

Okay, I'm confident. I can do this. The nines are my key, those Queens in hand will be the magic touch!
